sections.title: Introduction & Role Context
sections.goal: Establish interviewee's background, current responsibilities, and familiarity with observability tooling and practices relevant to Nimbus Observability.
sample_questions: Can you briefly walk me through your current role and how it connects to observability initiatives?
What experience do you have with OpenTelemetry in production environments?
How do you usually collaborate with SRE or QA teams when defining SLOs?

sections.title: Technical Foundations
sections.goal: Assess depth of knowledge in instrumentation, pipelines, metrics/logs/traces correlation, and automation via IaC for observability stacks.
sample_questions: Describe the pipeline you would design for ingesting and processing telemetry data at scale.
How would you ensure trace sampling strategies (e.g., RFC-1114) meet both performance and diagnostic needs?
What automation patterns have you used for deploying observability agents across multi-region clusters?

sections.title: Incident Analytics & SLO Management
sections.goal: Understand ability to link telemetry data to incident analysis, SLO tracking, and continuous improvement processes.
sample_questions: How would you approach alert fatigue tuning, possibly referencing RB-OBS-033?
Can you give an example of using incident analytics to adjust SLO thresholds?
What data points do you prioritize when conducting a post-incident review?

sections.title: Cross-Project Dependencies
sections.goal: Evaluate awareness of dependencies between Nimbus Observability and other Novereon projects, especially in regulated environments.
sample_questions: How might observability requirements differ for the Orion Edge Gateway vs. Helios Datalake?
What integration points exist between Nimbus Observability and the Aegis IAM project for secure telemetry?
How would you adapt pipeline configurations to meet the SLA-ORI-02 latency constraints?

sections.title: Decision-Making & Risk Management
sections.goal: Probe decision-making under constraints, trade-off analysis, and ability to provide evidence-based recommendations.
sample_questions: When balancing high-cardinality metrics with storage cost limits (POL-FIN-007), what trade-offs would you consider?
Describe a situation where you had to choose between increasing sampling rate and maintaining system performance.
If a critical alerting pipeline fails, how would you decide whether to trigger a failover per RB-OBS-033?

sections.title: Closing & Reflection
sections.goal: Summarize key points, allow candidate to clarify or expand, and assess cultural fit with Novereon Systemsâ€™ values.
sample_questions: What would be your first priority if you joined the Nimbus Observability team?
How do you align automation initiatives with 'Safety First' and 'Sustainable Velocity' values?
Any questions for us about the project or organizational processes?
